name: The Purr-fect Party
description:
A cute little game for the UE4 Game Jam.

As the party-planning cat, fill your shopping cart with as many items as possible.

As the poor, downtrodden dog, rush to fulfill the cat's order before you get fired.

Team info:

Art, UI, UX, and balancing: Anna Funk

Programming and design: Dan McPhee

Level design: Katie Malin
